mapper.insert: insert into store_image (store_id, file_name, file_order, cre_date, upd_date) values(#{storeId}, #{fileName}, #{fileOrder}, '20190203','20190204')
mapper.select: select store_image.store_id, store_image.file_name, store_image.file_order from store_image where store_image.store_id=#{storeId}
